description: Demand universal healthcare for all. Healthcare is a human right, not a privilege!

description: Take to the streets to demand urgent action on climate change. Our planet's future depends on it!

description: Raise funds to support political prisoners and advocate for prison abolition.

description: Share food, build community, and protest against war and poverty. Solidarity, not charity!

description: Demand bold action on climate change and economic justice. The time for change is now!

name: IWW Workers' Solidarity Conference
description: Unite workers and fight for a world without bosses. Solidarity forever!

description: Celebrate LGBTQ+ pride and continue the fight for queer liberation. Love is love!

description: Center Indigenous voices in the fight against climate change. Honor Indigenous sovereignty!

description: Learn how to monitor and document police activity to hold law enforcement accountable.

description: Explore Marxist theory and principles. Knowledge is power!

description: Oppose imperialism and militarism. War is not the answer!

description: Demand climate justice and worker solidarity. Our planet, our future!

description: Explore democratic confederalism and gender equality. Building grassroots democracy!

description: Learn self-defense and community defense tactics. Protect your community from oppression!

description: Learn about participatory budgeting and have a say in how public funds are allocated. Your voice matters!

description: Join the movement to abolish capitalism, prisons, and the state. Another world is possible!

description: Get legal support and advocacy for transgender rights and discrimination cases. Justice for all genders!

description: Fight back against gentrification and displacement. Housing is a human right!

description: Demand fair wages, labor protections, and dignity for domestic workers. Respect all work!

description: Discuss anarchist principles and strategies for worker self-management. Workers of the world, unite!

description: Stand in solidarity with Indigenous peoples in the fight against colonialism and capitalism. Land back!

description: Join the fight against plastic pollution and protect our oceans. Every action counts!

description: Honor Indigenous sovereignty and resist colonialism and racism. Land back, sovereignty now!

description: Discuss democratic autonomy and self-governance in Kurdish regions and beyond. Power to the people!

description: Demand healthcare as a human right and safe working conditions for nurses. Patients over profits!
